name: bob
description: Bob - Claude Code Manager Desktop App
author: Bob Team <sean@reedster.llc>

scripts.dev:clean: lsof -ti:47285 | xargs -r kill -9; lsof -ti:43829 | xargs -r kill -9; npm run dev
scripts.dev:stop: lsof -ti:47285 | xargs -r kill -9; lsof -ti:43829 | xargs -r kill -9
scripts.dev:app: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "wait-on http://localhost:47285 && npm run dev:electron"
scripts.dev:jeff: JEFF_MODE=true ENABLE_GITHUB_AUTH=false concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.build: npm run sync-version && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.build:app: npm run set-product-name && npm run build && electron-builder
scripts.build:app:dir: npm run set-product-name && npm run build && electron-builder --dir
scripts.build:app:no-auth: ENABLE_GITHUB_AUTH=false npm run set-product-name && npm run build && electron-builder
scripts.build:app:jeff: JEFF_MODE=true ENABLE_GITHUB_AUTH=false npm run set-product-name && npm run build && electron-builder
scripts.start: cd backend && NODE_ENV=production npm run start
scripts.install:dependencies: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.install:dependencies:ci: npm ci && cd backend && npm ci && cd ../frontend && npm ci
scripts.install:dependencies:win: npm install --ignore-scripts && cd backend && npm install --ignore-scripts && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd .. && npm run rebuild:native
scripts.install:dependencies:mac: npm install --ignore-scripts && cd backend && npm install --ignore-scripts && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd .. && npm run rebuild:native:mac
scripts.rebuild:native: cd backend && npm rebuild node-pty || echo 'Warning: node-pty rebuild failed, terminal features may not work'
scripts.rebuild:native:mac: cd backend && npm rebuild node-pty || echo 'Warning: node-pty rebuild failed, terminal features may not work'
scripts.dist: npm run set-product-name && npm run build && electron-builder --publish=never
scripts.dist:linux: npm run set-product-name && npm run build && electron-builder --linux --publish=never
scripts.dist:mac: npm run set-product-name && npm run build && electron-builder --mac --publish=never
scripts.dist:win: npm run set-product-name && npm run build && electron-builder --win --publish=never
scripts.dist:jeff: JEFF_MODE=true ENABLE_GITHUB_AUTH=false npm run set-product-name && npm run build && electron-builder --publish=never
